column5: Manufacturing and service industries require many more talents who can tackle the challenges that come with operating in a complex, global environment. Learn advanced techniques for integrating product development at different levels, and how to design and manufacture intelligent, sustainable and internationally competitive products.Who is it for?This truly world-leading course has been designed to address the need for highly trained business leaders able to respond to the challenges and demands of modern globalised markets.The course has been developed to enhance your design engineering future and focuses on manufacturing and product design and development.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: One year full-time, two-five years part-time
